survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Sustainable Coffee Brands Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and behaviors regarding sustainable coffee brands, including purchasing habits, brand awareness, and factors influencing buying decisions.

questions.question_text: How often do you purchase sustainable coffee brands?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale for clarity. Ensure the options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you purchase sustainable coffee brands?

questions.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you when choosing a sustainable coffee brand? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to capture multiple preferences. Include an 'Other' option for additional insights.

script.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you when choosing a sustainable coffee brand? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you choose sustainable coffee brands over conventional ones?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed responses. Ensure the text box is large enough for thorough answers.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you choose sustainable coffee brands over conventional ones?

questions.question_text: Are you willing to pay a premium for sustainable coffee brands?
answer_options: No, I prefer not to pay extra
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to gauge price sensitivity. Options should cover all possible responses.

script.question_text: Are you willing to pay a premium for sustainable coffee brands?
answer_options: No, I prefer not to pay extra

questions.question_text: Which sustainable coffee brands are you aware of? (Please list as many as you can)
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to assess brand awareness. No character limit to encourage comprehensive responses.

script.question_text: Which sustainable coffee brands are you aware of? (Please list as many as you can)
